definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: Both the general names and the proper names are the important parts of the Zhuang geograpnical names system.
sentences.chinese: 通名和專名是壯語地名詞彙系統的重要內容。

definition: to introduce oneself/originally a theatrical device in which a character explains his own role
lit. your honored carriage/your highness/honored Sir (also sarcastic)/you
to address sb directly by name (idiom)/to address sb by name without using an honorific title (indicating either familiarity or overfamiliarity)
to greet/to go out to meet
(old) to bow and utter polite phrases/to open the way (for a dignitary etc)
to say clearly/to argue clearly/to pronounce/pronounced
to create a disturbance/to make trouble/to harass
